# fixedSpace(_:)

**Type Method**

Creates a new fixed-width space item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func fixedSpace(_ width: CGFloat) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **width**: The width of the space.

## Return Value

A fixed-width space [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarButtonItem].

## Creating space items

- **fixedSpace()**: Creates a new fixed space item of zero width.
- **flexibleSpace()**: Creates a new flexible-width space item.
